attributes.action: Hold Michael Fallon MP to account: Licensing Arms sales to KSA for use in Yemen
attributes.background: The government has known for many months that Saudi Arabia are involved in genocide in Yemen and are deliberately bombing civilians. The MOD licence weapons sales to Saudi Arabia. It is illegal under International Law to do this where it is suspected that these weapons are being used on civilians

rejection.details:
Petitions need to contain a clear request for action from the UK Government or Parliament. 

There is already an open petition calling for the sale of arms to Saudi Arabia tob e stopped: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/114008
